EmailTemplate.subject: [IMPORTANT NOTICE] GoDirect™ Flight Bag Pro to Discontinue Support for Apple iOS 9
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer, On October 31st, 2018, we will discontinue support for any devices running Apple iOS 9 or older. To ensure the best possible experience when using GoDirect Flight Bag Pro, please upgrade to the latest version of iOS. Click here <[[https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT201685]]> to learn how to check which version of iOS you are currently running. Click here <[[https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204204]]> to learn how to update iOS on your device.
What Happens Next? The next version of Flight Bag Pro will release at the end of September and will only be available for download for devices running 10.3 or higher. Devices running previous versions of iOS will not see the update and will no longer receive app updates with new features, bug fixes or enhancements. We hope you find this information helpful as your flight department prepares for the next release of Flight Bag Pro. Thanks, The Honeywell GoDirect Team Need Help Getting off the Ground?
Our Honeywell Flight Services representatives can assist your flight department with getting GoDirect Flight Bag Pro installed and ready to go. Whether your flight crews are transitioning from the myGDC app, need help accessing their Jeppesen charts, or simply have a question, our team is here to help.
